text: Going the Distance is a 2004 Canadian movie. It was directed by Mark Griffiths. It is set across Canada. Its tagline was "They came. They saw. They came." The film was released in Canada as Going the Distance, but in the USA, it was called National Lampoon's Going the Distance. The Canadian DVD release has its original release title. ==Other websites== * Category:2004 comedy movies Category:2000s road movies Category:2000s teen comedy movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:2000s English-language movies
title: Going the Distance (2004 movie)
